summary: This is an email chain between attorney Brad Edwards and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding an upcoming July 14th, 2020 court hearing. The AUSA provides scheduling information and dial-in instructions, and Edwards forwards a letter from an unnamed individual (likely a victim) to the court.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Board certified trial attorney representing victims, forwarding a letter to the court and coordinating hearing arrangements.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York providing court scheduling orders and dial-in instructions for a hearing.

connections.description: Exchanging scheduling information and court documents regarding an upcoming hearing for victims.

events.title: Court Hearing
events.description: A court hearing scheduled where victims may exercise their right to be heard, with audio feed and video overflow room arrangements.

keyFacts: A court hearing was scheduled for July 14, 2020, with arrangements for victims to potentially address the court.
The Assistant United States Attorney provided dial-in instructions for an audio feed and information about a video overflow room.
Attorney Brad Edwards received a letter from an unnamed individual (redacted/implied victim) intended for the court.
The correspondence shows coordination between victim counsel and federal prosecutors regarding victim participation in legal proceedings.
